entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is described as a charming boy and a brilliant young boy who formed a close friendship with Gellert Grindelwald. He is also mentioned to have sent letters to Gellert in the dead of night.

entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is described as someone who introduced Albus Dumbledore to Gellert Grindelwald and showed a letter that Albus Dumbledore sent to Gellert.

entities.name: gellert grindelwald
entities.description: Gellert Grindelwald is described as a brilliant young boy who formed a close friendship with Albus Dumbledore and received letters from him in the dead of night.

relationships.description: Albus Dumbledore and Gellert Grindelwald formed a close friendship, as described by Bathilda.
Bathilda introduced Albus Dumbledore to Gellert Grindelwald and showed a letter that Albus Dumbledore sent to Gellert.
Albus Dumbledore sent letters to Gellert Grindelwald in the dead of night, as described by Bathilda.
